about.title: About Our Doctor
about.name: Specialist Dr. Soner √áaƒüatay
about.bio: I graduated from Ankara University Faculty of Veterinary Medicine in 2010. Specializing in cat and dog diseases, I have been working for the health of our little friends for over 10 years. In our clinic, we aim to provide the best treatment with love and care using all the possibilities of modern medicine. I have experience especially in surgical operations and internal medicine.
